price: 126. (Alle) wuxuu odhan: Sidaasoo kale waxaa kuu yimid Aayadahayaga, waadse iska illowday (oo ka dan la’aatay), sidaas darteed Maanta, waxaa lagaaga tegi  oo lagugu illoobi (Naarta).”
arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ أَتَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَاۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُنسَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla kadhālika atatka āyātunā fanasītahā wakadhālika al-yawma tunsā
